tool_description: Calculates synchronization royalties from TV, film, advertising, and other media licensing deals.

catalog_number.description: Unique catalog identifier for the song

license_fee.description: Total licensing fee for the sync deal

usage_type.description: Type of synchronization usage (TV, film, advertising, video_game, online_video)

territory_scope.description: Territorial scope of the license (US, UK, WW, etc.)

media_duration.description: Duration of media usage in seconds

song_usage_duration.description: Duration of song usage within media in seconds

advance_payment.description: Advance payment made against future royalties

error_messages: Invalid license fee: License fee must be a positive number greater than zero.
Invalid usage type: Must be one of 'TV', 'film', 'advertising', 'video_game', or 'online_video'.
Invalid license period: End date must be after start date with valid ISO 8601 format.
Invalid duration values: media_duration and song_usage_duration must be positive integers, with song usage not exceeding media duration.
Invalid territory scope: Must be valid territory code or 'WW' for worldwide.
Advance exceeds fee: advance_payment cannot exceed license_fee.
usage: Provide catalog_number, license_fee, usage_type, territory_scope, license dates, and duration information. Optionally include advance_payment. Calculates sync royalties based on usage terms.

usage_percentage.description: Percentage of total media duration used

payment_status.description: Status indicating if payment is due or advance covers amount
